traditional: 民間
mínjiān among the people; popular; folk; non-governmental; involving people rather than governments

traditional: 開支
kāizhī expenditures; pay; expenses

traditional: 加緊
jīajǐn to intensify; to speed up; to step up
lǐzìchéng Li ZiCheng (1605-1645), leader of peasant rebellion at the end of the Ming Dynasty

traditional: 職務
zhíwù a post; a position
shèjí involve; touch upon (a topic)

traditional: 分開
fēnkāi to separate; to part

traditional: 再說
zàishuō let's talk about it later; what's more; besides

traditional: 體操

píngjìa to evaluate; to assess
huāshēng peanut; groundnut

traditional: 電影

yīdàn in case (something happens); once (something becomes true, then...); in one day

xīngfèn excited; excitement
